summary.en: Multidisciplinary Engineer with a background in Biomedical and Electrical Engineering, currently specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Medical Image & Data Processing. Working at Siemens Healthineers while pursuing a Master's degree at the University of Erlangen-Nuremberg. Over two and a half years of experience in medical device maintenance, AI model development, embedded systems, and software engineering. Strong technical skills in Python, MATLAB, C, C++, embedded systems design, hardware troubleshooting, and medical device regulations.
summary.de: Medizintechnikingenieur mit Spezialisierung auf medizinische Bild- und Datenverarbeitung. Derzeit bei Siemens Healthineers tätig und gleichzeitig Master-Studium an der Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg. Mehr als zweieinhalb Jahre Erfahrung in der Wartung von Medizingeräten, Softwareentwicklung und Implementierung von Gesundheitstechnologien. Fundierte technische Kenntnisse in Python, MATLAB, C++ und Medizingeräteregulierung.

highlights.en: Contributed to the development of AR/VR-based digital education content for medical equipment, enhancing interactive learning experiences.
Contributed to product and hardware lifecycle management, including strategic planning, backlog tracking using Azure DevOps, and close coordination with multidisciplinary teams.
Authored detailed technical documentation, designed Power BI dashboards for product insights, and led live demonstrations to showcase key features and training workflows to stakeholders.
Performed precise installation and configuration of medical devices in compliance with manufacturer protocols and clinical standards.
Diagnosed and resolved hardware and software issues through systematic troubleshooting, minimizing downtime and ensuring operational efficiency.
Conducted regular preventive and corrective maintenance on ICU and OR equipment, ensuring reliability and adherence to hospital safety regulations.
Provided comprehensive training to medical staff on the safe and effective use of medical technologies, improving clinical workflow and device utilization.

degree.en: MSc in Medical Engineering (Medical Image and Data Processing)
degree.de: MSc in Medizintechnik (Medizinische Bildgebung und Datenverarbeitung)

specialization.en: Dissertation: Artificial Neural Network-based Volume Conductor Solver for electrical Spinal Cord Stimulation Applications (In Progress)
specialization.de: Masterarbeit: Auf künstlichen neuronalen Netzwerken basierender Lösungsansatz für Volumenleiter bei Anwendungen der Rückenmarkstimulation (in Bearbeitung)

degree.en: Bachelor's degree in Systems and Biomedical Engineering (5-year degree)
degree.de: Bachelor in System- und Biomedizintechnik (5-jähriges Studium)

specialization.en: Dissertation: AR in Education - A medical mobile application for addressing educational challenges using augmented reality technology developed by Unity engine in an interactive way
